TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFolderProjectItem

Docs.summary: Provides an interface for a project folder in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.Design.IDocumentProjectItem AddDocument (string name, byte[] content);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.IDocumentProjectItem AddDocument(string name, unsigned int8[] content) cil managed

Docs.param: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> containing the document contents.
Docs.summary: Adds a document to a project folder in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.IFolderProjectItem AddFolder(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name for the new folder.
Docs.summary: Creates a new folder in a project folder of a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
Gets a collection of items in a project folder in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the items in the project folder of the design host.
